text: Colette Ritz, real name Benitte Colette (Paris, 8 May 1932 - Proisy, 9 September 2007) was a French pop singer of the 1960s.Qobuz.com BNF Album ==References== Category:French female pop singers Category:1932 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Place of birth missing Category:20th-century French singers Category:20th-century French women singers
title: Colette Ritz
